#summary Overview of the requirements for easy installation of support for third-party hardware.

= Examples =

[http://sanguino.cc/ Sanguino] ([http://sanguino.cc/softwareforwindows instructions]):
  * additional board definition
  * additional bootloader
  * custom core
  * modified libraries

[http://www.pjrc.com/teensy/ Teensy] ([http://www.pjrc.com/teensy/td_download.html instructions]):
  * additional board definitions
  * custom core
  * modified library
  * custom uploader
  * post-build processing
